plain: Based on the user's favorite movies, it can be inferred that they have a diverse taste in film. They enjoy a variety of genres, including drama, documentary, comedy, horror, science fiction, and fantasy. The user also appears to have a preference for movies with complex and thought-provoking plots, as well as those that are visually stunning and have a strong emphasis on writing and character development. The user's favorite runtime is likely to be around 2 hours, as many of the listed movies fall within this range. Themes of mental health, trauma, and the supernatural seem to be of particular interest to the user.
